blockHash.description: BlockHash is the hash of the block where the transaction was included.

blockHeight.description: BlockHeight is the height of the block where the transaction was included.

extraInfo.description: ExtraInfo provides extra information for given transaction.

merklePath.description: MerklePath is the Merkle path used to calculate Merkle root of the block in which the transaction was included.

status.description: Status is the status of the response.

timestamp.description: Timestamp is the timestamp of the block where the transaction was included.

title.description: Title is the title of the response.

txStatus.description: TxStatus is the status of the transaction.

fullName.description: The complete name of the contact, including first name, middle name (if applicable), and last name.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is a time when outer model was created.

deleted_at.description: DeletedAt is a time when outer model was deleted.

id.description: ID is an hash of the compressed public key.

key.description: Key is a string representation of an access key.

metadata.description: Metadata is a metadata map of outer model.

revoked_at.description: RevokedAt is a time when access key was revoked.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is a time when outer model was updated.

xpub_id.description: XpubID is an access key's xpub related id.

balance.description: Balance is a total balance of all xpubs.

destinations.description: Destinations is a total number of destinations.

paymail_addresses.description: PaymailAddresses is a total number of paymail addresses.

transactions.description: Transactions is a total number of committed transactions.

transactions_per_day.description: TransactionsPerDay is a total number of committed transactions per day.

utxos.description: Utxos is a total number of utxos.

utxos_per_type.description: UtxosPerType are utxos grouped by type.

xpubs.description: Xpubs is a total number of xpubs.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is a time when outer model was created.

deleted_at.description: DeletedAt is a time when outer model was deleted.

fullName.description: FullName is name which could be shown instead of whole paymail address.

id.description: ID is a unique identifier of contact.

metadata.description: Metadata is a metadata map of outer model.

paymail.description: Paymail is a paymail address related to contact.

pubKey.description: PubKey is a public key related to contact (receiver).

status.description: Status is a contact's current status.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is a time when outer model was updated.

chain.description: Chain is a destination's chain representation.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is a time when outer model was created.

deleted_at.description: DeletedAt is a time when outer model was deleted.

draft_id.description: DraftID is a destination's draft id.

id.description: ID is a destination id which is the hash of the LockingScript.

locking_script.description: LockingScript is a destination's locking script.

metadata.description: Metadata is a metadata map of outer model.

num.description: Num is a destination's num representation.

paymail_external_derivation_num.description: PaymailExternalDerivationNum is the chain/num/(ext_derivation_num) location of the address related to the xPub.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is a time when outer model was updated.

xpub_id.description: XpubID is a destination's xpub related id used to register destination.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is a time when outer model was created.

deleted_at.description: DeletedAt is a time when outer model was deleted.

expires_at.description: ExpiresAt is a time when draft transaction expired.

final_tx_id.description: FinalTxID is a final transaction id.

hex.description: Hex is a draft transaction hex.

id.description: ID is a draft transaction id.

metadata.description: Metadata is a metadata map of outer model.

status.description: Status is a draft transaction lastly monitored status.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is a time when outer model was updated.

xpub_id.description: XpubID is a draft transaction's xpub used to sign transaction.

bytes.description: Bytes is a fee unit bytes representation.

satoshis.description: Satoshis is a fee unit satoshis amount.

app.description: App is a map protocol app.

keys.description: Keys is a map protocol keys.

type.description: Type is a map protocol type.

hex.description: Hex is a full hex of op return.

hex_parts.description: HexParts is a slice of splitted hex parts.

map.description: Map is a pointer to a map protocol object.

string_parts.description: StringParts is a slice of string parts.

orderByField.description: Field by which to order the results

sortDirection.description: Direction in which to order the results ASC/DSC

alias.description: Alias is a paymail address's alias (first part of paymail).

avatar.description: Avatar is a paymail address's avatar.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is a time when outer model was created.

deleted_at.description: DeletedAt is a time when outer model was deleted.

domain.description: Domain is a paymail address's domain (second part of paymail).

id.description: ID is a paymail address id.

metadata.description: Metadata is a metadata map of outer model.

public_name.description: PublicName is a paymail address's public name.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is a time when outer model was updated.

xpub_id.description: XpubID is a paymail address's xpub related id used to register paymail address.

alias.description: Alias is a paymail p4 alias.

domain.description: Domain is a paymail p4 domain.

from_paymail.description: FromPaymail is a paymail p4 from paymail.

note.description: Note is a paymail p4 note.

pub_key.description: PubKey is a paymail p4 pub key.

receive_endpoint.description: ReceiveEndpoint is a paymail p4 receive endpoint.

reference_id.description: ReferenceID is a paymail p4 reference id.

resolution_type.description: ResolutionType is a paymail p4 resolution type.

address.description: Address is a script output address.

satoshis.description: Satoshis is a script output satoshis.

script.description: Script is a script output script.

script_type.description: ScriptType is a script output script type.

content.description: List of records for the response

experimental_features.description: ExperimentalFeatures is a map of experimental features handled by spv-wallet.

paymail_domains.description: PaymailDomains is a list of paymail domains handled by spv-wallet.

broadcast.description: Broadcast is a flag that indicates whether to broadcast transaction or not.

broadcast_instant.description: BroadcastInstant is a flag that indicates whether to broadcast transaction instantly or not.

paymail_p2p.description: PaymailP2P is a flag that indicates whether to use paymail p2p or not.

sync_on_chain.description: SyncOnChain is a flag that indicates whether to sync transaction on chain or not.

block_hash.description: BlockHash is a block hash that transaction is in.

block_height.description: BlockHeight is a block height that transaction is in.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is a time when outer model was created.

deleted_at.description: DeletedAt is a time when outer model was deleted.

draft_id.description: DraftID is a transaction related draft id.

metadata.description: Metadata is a metadata map of outer model.

number_of_inputs.description: NumberOfInputs is a number of transaction inputs.

number_of_outputs.description: NumberOfOutputs is a number of transaction outputs.

output_value.description: OutputValue is a total output value.

outputs.description: Outputs represents all spv-wallet-transaction outputs. Will be shown only for admin.

total_value.description: TotalValue is a total input value.

updated_at.description: UpdatedAt is a time when outer model was updated.

xpub_in_ids.description: XpubInIDs is a slice of xpub input ids.

xpub_out_ids.description: XpubOutIDs is a slice of xpub output ids.

change_destinations.description: ChangeDestinations is a slice of change destinations.

change_minimum_satoshis.description: ChangeMinimumSatoshis is a minimum satoshis for change.

change_number_of_destinations.description: ChangeNumberOfDestinations is a number of change destinations.

expires_in.description: ExpiresAt is a time when transaction expires.

fee_unit.description: FeeUnit is a pointer to a fee unit object.

from_utxos.description: FromUtxos is a slice of from utxos used to build transaction.

include_utxos.description: IncludeUtxos is a slice of utxos to include in transaction.

inputs.description: Inputs is a slice of transaction inputs.

outputs.description: Outputs is a slice of transaction outputs.

send_all_to.description: SendAllTo is a pointer to a transaction output object.

created_at.description: CreatedAt is a time when outer model was created.

deleted_at.description: DeletedAt is a time when outer model was deleted.

destination.description: Destination is a pointer to a destination object.

draft_id.description: DraftID is a utxo transaction related draft id.

id.description: ID is a utxo id which is a hash from transaction id and output index.

metadata.description: Metadata is a metadata map of outer model.

output_index.description: OutputIndex is a output index that utxo points to.

reserved_at.description: ReservedAt is a time utxo was reserved at.

satoshis.description: Satoshis is a utxo satoshis amount.

script_pub_key.description: ScriptPubKey is a utxo script pub key.

spending_tx_id.description: SpendingTxID is a spending transaction id - null if not spent yet.

transaction_id.description: TransactionID is a transaction id that utxo points to.

op_return.description: OpReturn is a pointer to a op return object.

paymail_p4.description: PaymailP4 is a pointer to a paymail p4 object.

script.description: Script is a transaction output string representation of script.

scripts.description: ScriptType is a transaction output script type.

to.description: To is a transaction output destination address.

use_for_change.description: UseForChange is a flag that indicates if this output should be used for change.

next_external_num.description: NextExternalNum is the index derivation number use to generate NEXT external xPub (external xPub are used for address destinations).

next_internal_num.description: NextInternalNum is the index derivation number use to generate NEXT internal xPub (internal xPub are used for change destinations).

fullName.description: FullName is name which could be shown instead of whole paymail address.

paymail.description: Paymail is a paymail address related to contact.

pubKey.description: PubKey is a public key related to contact (receiver).

status.description: Status is a contact's current status.

number.description: Number is the number of the page returned

size.description: Size is the number of elements on a single page

totalElements.description: TotalElements is the total number of elements in the returned collection

totalPages.description: TotalPages is total number of pages returned

content.description: Content is the collection of elements that serves as the content
